physical_appearance: "This is a turquoise cheongsam that is paired with a long-sleeved matching jacket, also turquoise in colour. The cheongsam is short-sleeved There are floral patterns only on the collar, hem, and sleeves of the jacket, but not on the cheongsam. A collar is present on the cheongsam but not on the jacket, which has a neckline instead. There are three buttons running down the centre of the jacket's front. They are circular in shape. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam and the jacket. There is a label tag that is titled ""Johnson"" located at the collar of the jacket."
sgcool_label_text: This is a short-sleeved turquoise cheongsam with a matching jacket. The jacket is decorated with blue and grey floral lace at the collar, hem and sleeves. The cheongsam is made in Hong Kong and has a tailor’s label, “Johnson”.
subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns lace (needlework) tailor-made
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Jackets Women's clothing Motifs Custom-made clothing
